mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_id, user_pwd, user_name, user_phone, user_email, user_nickname) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userPhone}, #{userEmail}, #{userNickname})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_pwd = #{userPwd}, user_name = #{userName}, user_phone = #{userPhone}, user_email = #{userEmail}, user_nickname = #{userNickname}, user_role = #{userRole}npm WHERE user_id = #{userId}
